sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,ORDER_ID ,TERMINAL_ID ,MERCHANT_ID ,MERCHANT_NAME ,TSN ,TRANS_CODE ,MERCHANT_ORDER_ID ,MERCHANT_ORDER_TIME ,MERCHANT_ORDER_AMT ,MERCHANT_ORDER_CURRENCY ,PHONE_NUM ,PRODUCT_TYPE ,BUS_TYPE ,TRANS_TYPE ,TERMINAL_IP ,USER_IP ,BATCH_NO ,VOUCHER_NO ,RESP_CODE ,RESP_DESC ,TRANS_TIME ,CREATE_DATE ,FULL_CARD_NO ,FULL_CARD_NO2 ,RESERVED1 FROM ERR_ORDER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND ERR_ORDER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ID) Like '%'||(#merchant_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_NAME) Like '%'||(#merchant_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TSN) Like '%'||(#tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_CODE) Like '%'||(#trans_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_TIME) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_CURRENCY) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_currency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PHONE_NUM) Like '%'||(#phone_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRODUCT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#product_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_IP) Like '%'||(#terminal_ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_IP) Like '%'||(#user_ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(VOUCHER_NO) Like '%'||(#voucher_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_CODE) Like '%'||(#resp_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_DESC) Like '%'||(#resp_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FULL_CARD_NO) Like '%'||(#full_card_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FULL_CARD_NO2) Like '%'||(#full_card_no2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM ERR_ORDER_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND ERR_ORDER_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ID) Like '%'||(#merchant_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_NAME) Like '%'||(#merchant_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TSN) Like '%'||(#tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_CODE) Like '%'||(#trans_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_TIME) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MERCHANT_ORDER_CURRENCY) Like '%'||(#merchant_order_currency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PHONE_NUM) Like '%'||(#phone_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRODUCT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#product_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_IP) Like '%'||(#terminal_ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_IP) Like '%'||(#user_ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(VOUCHER_NO) Like '%'||(#voucher_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_CODE) Like '%'||(#resp_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_DESC) Like '%'||(#resp_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FULL_CARD_NO) Like '%'||(#full_card_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FULL_CARD_NO2) Like '%'||(#full_card_no2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
